issue.title: [Documentation] Add a docker-compose entry which builds the documentation with CUDA enabled
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4309](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4309). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This needs to be updated to build with CUDA support (which in turn will require the host machine to have nvidia-docker), among other things
